name: GLITCH_DOG

__________________________________________________________________________________

Explore a fallen world as the GLITCH_DOG, trying to avoid anomalies and the wreckage of the future as you navigate through an intense platformer. Can you make it through the world in 20 minutes, before your time is up? Can you help your faithful companion find the stars and moon once again? And will you be able to travel the electric way as the world crashes down around you?

GLITCH_DOG was created by Forked Lightning as an exercise in time-limited game development. By setting a time limit of 50 hours for the project and re-using assets and code where possible, we were able to create a quick platformer that also served as a proof of concept for short-form game development.

Credit to Luis Zuno (@ansimuz) for the initial assets that helped make the game happen.
